text: Sathyabhama is a 2007 Telugu-language drama film directed by Srihari Nanu. The film stars Sivaji, Bhumika Chawla, Nimisha, and Chandra Mohan in the lead roles. The film is based on the 2004 American film 50 First Dates. ==Plot== The film follows a sand sculptor (Sivaji) who meets a woman (Chawla) who he later learns has memory issues. ==Cast== ;Main cast * Sivaji as Krishna Kumar alias Krishna * Bhumika Chawla as Sathyabhama * Nimisha * Chandra Mohan ;Supporting cast * Brahmanandam * Sunil * M. S. Narayana as Padi Secondla Padmanabham * Raghu Babu * Siva Prasad * Melkote * Devi Charan * Chitram Seenu * Allari Subhashini as the restaurant manager * Babloo * Apoorva * Master Siva Varma * Baby Satyapriya * Krishna as the psychiatrist (special appearance) == Soundtrack == == Awards == Nandi Awards * Special Jury Award ..... Bhumika Chawla ==References== Category:2007 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Telugu-language films
